query.name: offset
query.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is null. if data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

query.name: page_size
query.description: The size of one page. Limit is [1,50].

query.name: update_time_from
query.description: The update_time_from and update_time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving orders (based on the item update time). The update_time_from field is the starting date range.

query.name: update_time_to
query.description: The update_time_from and update_time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving orders (based on the item update time). The update_time_to field is the ending date range

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/global_product/get_global_item_list?access_token=access_token&merchant_id=merchant_id&offset=AAAAFA%3D%3D&page_size=10&partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp&update_time_from=1611311600&update_time_to=1611311631',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.

schema.name: global_item_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an global item.

schema.name: update_time
schema.description: Timestamp that indicates the last time that there was a change in value of the item, such as price/stock change.

schema.name: has_next_page
schema.description: This is to indicate whether the item list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of items.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: If has_next_page is true, this value need set to next request.offset.
